p: Introductions: The present study was designed to compare the impact of resuscitation with either 0.9 % sodium chloride (0.9 % NaCl) or a balanced hydroxyethylstarch (HES) solution (6 % HES 130/0.4, Volulyte®, Fresenius Kabi, Bad Homburg, Germany) on the conjunctival microcirculation in a sheep model of haemorrhagic shock.
